oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tintype of Union veteran Charles Ward
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Charles Ward was born in Lincolnshire, England, and came to America as an eleven year old child. Living in New Harmony (Ind." he enlisted on February 1, 1861 in the 60th Ind. Vol. Inf. Regt., USA. Having fought for the Union in the Civil War as a British subject, he became a naturalized American citizen in Indiana in 1866.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ward, Charles
